rows.label: tlk70000053_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, Adel-sama, I'm glad I got the
chance to see you! There's something
I want to tell you about.

rows.label: tlk70000053_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The truth is, I made a friend
from Superbia! We hit it off
talking about how amazing you are.

rows.label: tlk70000053_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I was really happy that even someone
from such a big place like Superbia
could see you were special.

rows.label: tlk70000053_02_msg0004
rows.name:
My new friend even promised
to tell me all about Superbia
one of these days!

rows.label: tlk70000053_02_msg0005
rows.name:
You gave me the courage to
make new connections like
this, Adel-sama. Thank you!
